description: Beautifully designed, quality contract sofas & soft seating suitable for all environments. Our range of quality sofas are available in choice of colours, materials and styles to match existing décor and furnishings. All of our sofas are commercial grade and ideal for use in lounge areas, restaurants, cafes and bistros, bars, pubs and reception areas. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
